column4: Hi. i am using ubuntu with Nvidia 9400 GT 1GB. i just installed the Nouvau driver replacing the proprietary one... Direct Rendering is working. However compiz is not working. How do i enable 3d acceleration ?
Deception . my card is fine... with the proprietary driver it was as fast as anythng. jst wanted to try out nouveau
installed from the official repo ofcourse using synaptic.... troubles are. compiz not working. opengl based games running as slow as molasses in january..
it sounds like the driver is not so good, what makes you think the replacement has 3d rendering features?
